original_text:
This is what the Lord says:
“Do not learn the ways of the nations
    or be terrified by signs in the heavens,
    though the nations are terrified by them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 여러 나라의 길을 배우지 말라 이방 사람들은 하늘의 징조를 두려워하거니와 너희는 그것을 두려워하지 말라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
Do not learn the ways of the nations
or be terrified by signs in the heavens,
though the nations are terrified by them.
